description: SAP Business Technology Platform and development tools

globalShortcuts.name: Discovery Center
globalShortcuts.notes: Cost estimators, reference architectures, and BTP blueprints

globalShortcuts.name: SAP Build
globalShortcuts.notes: Low-code platform (Apps, Process Automation, Work Zone)

globalShortcuts.name: Generative AI Hub
globalShortcuts.notes: Access to foundation models and AI orchestration

globalShortcuts.name: CAP Samples (GitHub)
globalShortcuts.notes: Official SAP CAP sample projects and best practices

notes.title: CAP Service Generation
notes.content:
"Generate a CAP service for managing [entity] with CRUD operations, input validation, and authorization checks."

Example: "Generate a CAP service for managing customer complaints integrated with S/4HANA with CRUD handlers, input validation (required fields: customer ID, description, severity), authorization checks (managers can see all, employees only their own), and basic unit tests."

notes.title: Security Audit
notes.content:
"Review my BTP subaccount configuration and identify: 1) Security vulnerabilities (overly permissive roles, public endpoints), 2) Missing audit logs, 3) Compliance gaps for [standard]."

Example: "Review my BTP subaccount configuration and identify: 1) Security vulnerabilities (roles with wildcard permissions, endpoints without authentication), 2) Missing audit logs for sensitive operations, 3) Compliance gaps for SOC2 and ISO27001 certification requirements."

notes.title: RAG Implementation
notes.content:
"Design a document Q&A system using HANA Vector Engine + Generative AI Hub: 1) Architecture diagram showing data flow, 2) Document ingestion pipeline (chunking strategy, metadata extraction), 3) Embedding and retrieval logic, 4) Hallucination prevention techniques, 5) Cost estimate for [volume] queries/month."

Example: "Design a document Q&A system for 10,000 internal policy documents using HANA Vector Engine + Generative AI Hub: 1) Architecture diagram with component dependencies, 2) Ingestion pipeline (500-word chunks, extract title/date/department metadata), 3) Semantic search with 5 most relevant chunks, 4) Hallucination prevention (cite sources, confidence scores, fallback to 'I don't know'), 5) Cost estimate for 10K queries/month at $0.50 per 1000 API calls."

notes.title: Workflow Automation
notes.content:
"Design an approval workflow for [business process]: 1) Process steps with decision points, 2) Approval routing logic based on [criteria], 3) Integration points with SAP systems, 4) Notification and escalation rules, 5) Return JSON specification for Build Process Automation."

Example: "Design an expense report approval workflow: 1) Steps: Submit â†’ Manager Review â†’ Finance Review â†’ Payment, 2) Routing: <$500 skip Finance, >$5000 require VP approval, 3) Integration: Read employee data from SuccessFactors, post to S/4HANA for payment, 4) Notifications: Email at each step, escalate if pending >3 days, 5) Return Build Process Automation JSON with service tasks and human tasks configured."
